content.title: Research & publications
content.description: UNDP publications showcase the organizationâ€™s thought leadership and expertise and play a key role in fulfilling our mandate to support the realisation of the SDGs and encourage global development.

content.title: Stories
content.description: Our stories are visual and current snapshots of our work from around the world, showing how countries and communities are tackling development issues and moving the SDGs from paper to practice.

content.title: 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development
content.description: The 2030 Agenda is a plan of action for people, planet and prosperity. It also seeks to strengthen universal peace in larger freedom. It recognizes that eradicating poverty in all its forms and dimensions, including  extreme poverty, is the greatest global challenge and an indispensable requirement for sustainable development.

content.title: Results at a glance
content.description: #NextGenUNDP is designed to achieve integrated results at speed and at scale during both quiet and turbulent times.

content.title: News Centre
content.description: Our News center is a one-stop shop for multimedia press coverage and in-depth information on development-related issues. We provide news announcements, press releases and statements by UNDP leadership.
